resources.string: How would you best describe your experience
How can we better your experience?
Find out more about Gracious Givers
Please enter your email address and follow instructions
What type of user are you?
Have you always wanted to make a difference in the community, but didn\'t know where to start? Why not join us? We have a spirit of service – All you need is Heart.
At Gracious Givers, our ethos is based on hands-on volunteering. We firmly believe Action is so much more powerful than just feeling compassion and doing nothing about it.
Volunteering is a powerful way to create positive change and leave a lasting impact on the world.

Upon request, we provide volunteers with a certificate of recognition. Use this as proof to show your participation in community service and grass roots projects – increase your creditability on your resume, job application or let it serve as a reminder of your efforts to change South Africa for the better.
Get involved in changing South Africa on the ground, improving your confidence and self-esteem and being outdoors (most of the time) improving your physical and mental well-being.
Get out and about in the community
Develop new skills by learning from others. Put your skills and experience to use with our projects to benefit the community and the country on the whole.
Visit our Our Purpose Page to find out more about the volunteering process

Gracious Givers is not formally funded by the Government. We prefer it this way as we are 100% an organisation for the people by the people. We are able to do what we do through member contribution and donations.
Gracious Givers regular initiatives that you can get involved with as a Volunteer.

Thank you for being a part of our mission to make the world a better place. We greatly value your feedback, as it helps us improve our application and donor experience. Please take a moment to share your thoughts with us.
How are we funded and how do we afford doing what we do?
Groceries and most of our donors pay directly into the organisations bank account weekly or monthly.
Pick an initiative and contribute specially for that campaign. We will make sure your funds are used appropriately and specifically
Yearly lump sum payments that we draw on throughout the year
•\tAd Hoc donations as an when you see fit

You can also contribute through donations of grocery products, blankets, clothing, stationary or school shoes. Recommendations on other products are also welcome. Contact us for specific product donation and we can share our database of beneficiaries so that no donations go to waste.
We do not recommend cash donations – deposits through our official bank account allows us to track all receipts from our generous donors.
